name: Spotlight (RizingGamesUK)
description:
Description:

50 years in the future the world has been overtaken by technology however the humans continue to fight back. In order to regain control, they have hacked an enemy robot. Playing as this robot you must collect all the information and escape the facility without being detected!

How to play: 

WASD or arrow keys to move and space bar to jump. Do not interact with the enemies, their spotlights or the floor or you will respawn at the start of the level.

Created by:

Abi Frewer

Rizing Games
Cambridge Regional College
